task: Completed Phase 2 Day 4-5: Svelte Flow integration and mind mapping functionality
summary_of_work: Successfully implemented Phase 2 mind mapping with Svelte Flow integration. Created explore route, MindMap component, custom TopicNode and ConceptNode components with interactive functionality. Fixed broken navigation from landing page input components and added mind map visualization with expansion capabilities.
work: Created comprehensive mind mapping functionality: /explore route with URL parameter handling for topics and URLs, MindMap component with SvelteFlow integration including Controls, Background, and MiniMap, custom TopicNode component with expansion and interaction capabilities, custom ConceptNode component with level-based color schemes, node expansion system with mock AI-generated sub-concepts, proper event handling and node positioning algorithms, loading states and error handling for AI processing simulation, responsive design integration with existing Gray design system. Fixed navigation issues where TopicInput and UrlInput components were trying to navigate to non-existent routes. Updated all components to use modern Svelte 5 syntax with $state and $derived instead of legacy reactive statements.
description: Complete Svelte Flow mind mapping implementation providing interactive visualization of topics with expandable nodes, custom styling, and preparation for AI integration. Users can now navigate from landing page inputs to functional mind map exploration.
notes: This implementation establishes the core mind mapping functionality that makes the GetToKnow.it platform functional. The explore route now handles both topic and URL inputs, and users can see interactive mind maps with expansion capabilities. The components follow the Gray design system and include proper accessibility considerations. Mock data is used for node expansion pending AI integration in Phase 3. Some linting warnings remain (primarily @apply CSS warnings) but core functionality is complete and tested.
